story.book.dataclient

Class IOClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.dataclient.DataClient
      • story.book.dataclient.IOClient

  • public class IOClient
extends DataClient
    This class is used mainly to save stories on device, retrieve a list of stories on device, or to simply retrieve a story.
    Author:
    Anthony Ou

      • IOClient

        public IOClient(Context c)
        Unbuffered IO for writing a serialized story. Buffered IO for read a serialized story string.
        Parameters:
        c - the Context of the main application since the package name directory can change
